thread.title: The Weeknd Makes a Surprise Appearance During 6LACK's Los Angeles Concert: Watch
thread.title_full: The Weeknd Makes a Surprise Appearance During 6LACK's Los Angeles Concert: Watch

author: NHHMS
title: The Weeknd Makes a Surprise Appearance During 6LACK's Los Angeles Concert: Watch
text:
Christopher Polk/Getty Images for Interscope Records 
6lack and The Weeknd perform onstage at The Roxy on Jan. 24, 2017 in Los Angeles. 
On Tuesday night (Jan. 24), The Weeknd made a surprise appearance during 6LACK’s concert in Los Angeles. 
Before making his cameo, the Canadian crooner tantalized fans on Twitter by tweeting that he was “poppin’ up somewhere in LA tonight.” The artist born Abel Tesfaye then surprised fans with performances of “Starboy” and “Reminder” during 6LACK’s concert at The Roxy Theatre. The set follows a photo of 6LACK and XO artist Nav that Weeknd posted on his Instagram. 
The 24-year-old 6LACK is flourishing as a star in the making. He released his debut album Free 6LACK last November, and secured a feature on The Internet’s Syd’s forthcoming album Fin, due Feb. 3. 
Check out footage from 6LACK’s concert below. poppin’ up somewhere in LA tonight ⚡ 
— The Weeknd (@theweeknd) January 25, 2017 
☑️☑️ 
A photo posted by The Weeknd (@theweeknd) on Jan 23, 2017 at 1:37pm PST . @6LACK brought out @theweeknd in Los Angeles last night pic.twitter.com/YK8vcTA009
